subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic fought back from losing the first set to beat Marcos Baghdatis, 2-6, 6-2, 6-3, in the Swiss Indoors quarterfinals in Basel.
snippet: Novak Djokovic fought back from losing the first set to beat Marcos Baghdatis, 2-6, 6-2, 6-3, in the Swiss Indoors quarterfinals in Basel.
